title: Senior Developer
description:
• Lead a team of 3 engineers with mentoring, code reviews, and active contribution to development.
• Created a Flutter codebase that reduced delivery times by 30–40%.
• Developed a complete advanced Business Intelligence dashboard to improve enterprise decision-making.

title: Software Engineer
description:
• Collaborated with front-end and back-end teams to design ERP solutions using Odoo following Agile Scrum methodology.
• Integrated CI/CD pipelines to automate testing and deployments.
• Developed Android applications providing multiple ERP services such as Todo, Treasury, Distribution, Inventory, and Market Analysis.

title: Network Management Intern
description:
• Optimized network infrastructure using Cisco routers and switches with Nagios for monitoring.
• Implemented VPNs to secure communications.
• Monitored network performance using SNMP to ensure reliability and stability.

title: Fullstack Web Intern
description:
• Contributed to the development of an e-commerce web application.
• Used Django REST Framework and SQL for managing orders and stock.
• Followed the full development lifecycle from design to deployment.
